      • throttle

        public static ThrottlingConfig throttle(long maxBits,
                        TimeUnit perUnit)
        Returns a config which throttle the specified max bits per the given time unit with default bucketing interval.
        Parameters:
        maxBits - the preferred maximum bits
        perUnit - the time unit per which maximum bits specified
        Returns:
        a config which throttle the specified max bits per the given time unit
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified maxBits is non-positive value

      • throttling

        public final long throttling(TimeUnit perUnit)
        Returns maximum bits per the given time unit, i. e. the throttling. 0 (zero) designates there is no throttling.
        Parameters:
        perUnit - maximum bits is returned per this time unit
        Returns:
        maximum bits per the given time unit, or 0 if there is no throttling

      • bucketInterval

        public long bucketInterval(TimeUnit unit)
        Returns the throttle bucketing interval in the given time units.

        Default throttle bucketing interval is 100 millis.

        Parameters:
        unit - the time unit of the interval
        Returns:
        the bucketing interval for throttling in the given time units

      • bucketInterval

        public ThrottlingConfig bucketInterval(long throttleBucketInterval,
                              TimeUnit unit)
        Returns a copy of this config with the specified bucketing interval.
        Parameters:
        throttleBucketInterval - the bucketing interval for throttling
        unit - the time unit of the interval
        Returns:
        a copy of this config with the specified bucketing interval
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given bucketing interval is non-positive
